Trade/Device Name(s): ADVOCATE REDI-CODE DASH Blood Glucose Monitoring System
ADVOCATE REDI-CODE DASH Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model TD-4276
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ADVOCATE REDI-CODE DASH Blood Glucose Meter, Model TD-4276
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVOCATE REDI-CODE DASH Blood Glucose Monitoring System, an electrochemical glucose test system for home and professional use.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites (palm, forearm, upper-arm, calf, thigh); aids in monitoring diabetes control in home and professional settings; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
